narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. 
The applicant wishes to be issued a Class C exhibitors license.  
 
Applicant will forward the appropriate licensing fees to the ERO at the following address:
USDA APHIS AC
920 Main Campus Drive,  Suite 200
Raleigh, NC 27606.
NO REGULATED ACTIVITIES MAY BE CONDUCTED UNTIL A USDA CLASS C EXHIBITORS LICENSE IS
ISSUED.
An exit briefing was conducted with the applicant.
